dc_title_s: L'Amérique septentrionale: dressée sur les observations de Mrs. de l'Académie royale des sciences & quelques autres, & sur les mémoires les plus recens; par N. Sanson.
dc_description_s: Shows routes of Cortez, Drake, etc. Relief shown pictorially. Decorative cartouche. Delineates areas of the Sargasso Sea. 1 map col. 44 x 57 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
